laser1.name: laser1
laser1.description: Played when player presses the fire button (weapon 1)

laser2.description: Played when player presses the fire button (weapon 2)

laser3.name: laser3

attack-parried.name: attack_parried
attack-parried.description: Played when player parry an attack

cant-fire.name: cantFire
cant-fire.description: Played when player tries to fire without locking row and column

lock.name: lock
lock.description: Played when player lock a row or a column

double_lock.name: double_lock
double_lock.description: Played when player locked row and column
